title: Wrong labels in Update Test Suite dialog
description: The labels in the Update Test Suite dialog are incorrect. The label for 'Test Classes to be included' is written as 'TestClasses' without a space. Additionally, the status line refers to methods being selected instead of types. Lastly, the action name is written as 'TestSuite' instead of 'Test Suite'.
OB: The label for 'Test Classes to be included' should be 'Test Classes' with a space.
EB: The label for 'Test Classes to be included' should be 'Test Classes' with a space. The status line should refer to types instead of methods. The action name should be 'Test Suite' instead of 'TestSuite'.
SR: Update the labels in the Update Test Suite dialog: 'Test Classes to be included' should be changed to 'Test Classes' with a space. Update the status line to refer to types instead of methods. Change the action name to 'Test Suite'.
